description: Kent Police is appealing for information about the crash which happened on the A249 near Stockbury.
title: A249 crash: Man airlifted to hospital following Kent crash
title_page: A249 crash: Man airlifted to hospital following Kent crash - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been airlifted to hospital with serious injuries following a crash in Kent.
Police said the crash, which involved a silver Land Rover Discovery and a black BMW 1 Series, happened on the A249, near Stockbury, on Tuesday at 22:05 GMT.
A passenger from the BMW, a man in his 30s, was flown to a London hospital.
A woman in her 30s, who was a passenger in the Land Rover, also sustained serious injuries and was taken to a nearby hospital.
